event.name: Three Piece Suite Concert for Cruse
event.tags: jazz arrangements, folk music
event.short_description:
Jazz and folk blend with jazz favourites, energetic folk and original compositions.
Three Piece Suite perform concerts all over the West Country and further afield.
event.long_description: Jazz and folk blend with jazz favourites, energetic folk and original compositions. Three Piece Suite perform concerts all over the West Country and further afield. Combining their skills of classical guitar, jazz piano and folk fiddle, plus vocals, the unique repertoire of Three Piece Suite includes jazz arrangements of classical guitar numbers, energetic folk sets and songs and well known jazz favourites. Seamlessly moving through the styles, Three Piece Suite provide an evening of first class entertainment. Young musicians are encouraged in Three Piece Suite concerts and talented young classical pianist, Finn shields, will be giving a cameo performance during the evening. Three Piece Suite John Hooper jazz piano and vocals Helen James guitar and vocals Ali Nourse fiddle and vocals John, Helen and Ali who form the unique jazz and folk trio, Three Piece Suite, perform concerts all over the West Country and further afield to delighted audiences. Combining their skills of classical guitar, jazz piano and folk fiddle, plus vocal harmonies, their repertoire ranges from classical interpretations of Concerto de Aranjuez, wild and earthy and soul searching folk melodies and songs, through to the jazz favourites of Gershwin, Cole Porter, Hoagy Carmichel and Louis Armstrong. John Hooper is an outstanding jazz pianist with over 30 television and 200 Radio Broadcasts to his credit. He was the founder pianist with Bristol’s legendary Blue Note Jazz Band and later formed a jazz trio often featuring Bristol’s dynamic jazz singer, Kate McNabb. The trio had a regular Radio Two slot, “You & The Night & The Music”. John has played concerts across Europe, at the Albert Hall, the Berlin Philharmonic Hall and has performed with Acker Bilk and the Blue Notes at Bristol’s Colston Hall. He has also had the privilege of performing with some of America’s Jazz greats. Classical guitarist Helen James combines a pure classical tone with the lightness and freedom of folk music and the energy of flamenco. Trained at the Welsh College of Music and Drama, Helen James has a wealth of experience performing both classical guitar and folk music either as a soloist or in small ensembles, in concerts, playing for private functions, arts centres and music festivals. Helen is an accomplished singer with a smooth and pure vocal tone which she adapts for folk and jazz styles. Helen composes music, both songs and instrumentals and runs her own private teaching practice near Bath. Ali Nourse, a music teacher in Bath, has been steeped in folk music since the age of fourteen and has performed fiddle at many of the UK’s major folk festivals during her busy musical career. Classically trained at Dartington College on violin, piano and as a vocalist, Ali Nourse is an energetic fiddler with raw energy and dynamism and her heart is with folk music. This is genuine folk, played from the soul. Finn Shields is a talented young classical pianist and has performed many times as a guest of Three Piece Suite. A pupil at Beechen Cliff School, Bath, Finn is hoping to study music at University and is developing a mature repertoire, which includes Rachmaninov, Debussy and Chopin. He has played many times in public, most recently in the Bath Young Musician competition, where he was runner up. “What we play is life” Louis Armstrong: Combining musicianship honed by life experience with exuberance and humour, Three Piece Suite take you on an unforgettable musical journey! More information is on www.keyna.co.uk Cruse Bereavement Care is a major national charity whose purpose is to help people understand their grief and cope with their loss. A range of services is available including telephone support, Friendship and Support Groups and individual counselling sessions. People of all ages are helped and there is a specially trained group of Bereavement Volunteers who can work with children from the age of three. The area covered by this branch of the charity is very large and includes Bradford on Avon, Calne, Devizes, Chippenham, Shepton Mallet, Warminster and areas in between and of course, Bath. The cost to the charity of helping each client is approximately £150 and the cost to the client is nothing. On average Bath and District Cruse helps 500 clients a year and we have to work hard to maintain funds to pay for this service so that it remains free. In line with every other charity we are finding it difficult to keep going financially and although we are part of a national organisation, we receive no financial support from them. We rely on grants from beneficial bodies and donations and also have a busy fund raising programme. Events like this concert are vital to our continued existence and we are very grateful for your support! TICKETS http://www.chapelarts.org/events/?regevent_action=register&event_id=100&name_of_event=Three+Piece+Suite+Concert+for+Cruse WEBSITE http://www.chapelarts.org

event.name: Christ Agony @ The Underworld Camden
event.tags: Rock, Music, Metal, Hardcore, Camden, Worlds End, Underworld
event.short_description: Christ Agony is a Polish black metal band formed in 1990 in Olsztyn, Poland, by Cezary "Cezar" Augustynowicz (vocals & guitar), Żurek (drums), and Ash (bass & vocals).
event.long_description: Christ Agony is a Polish black metal band formed in 1990 in Olsztyn, Poland, by Cezary "Cezar" Augustynowicz (vocals & guitar), Żurek (drums), and Ash (bass & vocals). After the second album the line-up changed frequently between recordings. The band dissolved in 2003 due to a conflict with a record label, and released one album under the name Union. In 2007, the band reformed.

event.name: Lola Perrin and Alexis Kirke present The Geology of Music
event.artists: Lola Perrin - piano, Alexis Kirke - electronics, Dr Adam Maloof - geologist, Paul Williams - natural history filmmaker & writer
event.tags: live music, natural history, Geology, Dr Adam Maloof, classical music, Contemporary music, Paul Williams, Lola Perrin, Alexis Kirke, Film
event.short_description: Lola Perrin and Alexis Kirke present an evening of film, music and words inspired by a landmark fossil discovery by Dr Adam Maloof
event.long_description: Doors open at 6:30pm, performance begins at 7pm When Earth’s oceans were covered with ice from pole to pole and the temperature was around -74°F, “one animal somewhere must have survived so that it could continue on and eventually become humans”. So says Princeton geologist Dr Adam Maloof, and he must know as he headed the team that made the fossil discovery pushing back the first appearance of animals 70 million years to before one of the great ice ages. Lola Perrin and Alexis Kirke present an evening of film, music and words inspired by the story of the fossil find and its implications for a new understanding of our origins. In the final part of the concert Dr Adam Maloof will be in conversation with natural history filmmaker, writer and conservationist Paul Williams who will also moderate questions from the audience. Naim is delighted to be working with Lola and proud to be a supporter of tonight's performance. Weblinks for the artists and speakers: www.lolaperrin.com www.alexiskirke.com Adam Maloof https://www.princeton.edu/geosciences/people/maloof/ Paul Williams http://www.ironammonite.com/

event.name: William Tyler & Hiss Golden Messenger
event.tags: American solo guitarist, Live music Bath, folk, soul
event.short_description: William Tyler is well-known for his work as part of Lambchop and Silver Jews and has just released the album 'Behold The Spirit'. Hiss Golden Messenger - "Mystical country. An eerie yellowing photograph." David Bowie
event.long_description: William Tyler is well-known for his work as part of Lambchop and Silver Jews and has just released the album 'Behold The Spirit'. His recent tour dates supporting Yo La Tengo caused a whole heap of excitement in the US, and he's now he's coming to spread the magic over here. Reactions to the album have been widely euphoric, Pitchfork talking of "the grace and elocution of Behold the Spirit, the debut from young Nashville guitarist William Tyler. Arguably the most vital, energized album by an American solo guitarist in a decade or more, it accepts Fahey's legacy while escaping its shadow. Moreover, it's simply a joy to hear." Hiss Golden Messenger "Bad Debt recalls the ragged blues and front-porch musicians of eras long since gone and modern folk legends like Bonnie 'Prince' Billy and Iron & Wine, only with more edge than Sam Beam, more understatement than Will Oldham, and with a little Hank Williams tossed in for good measure" Mezzic.com "Mystical country. An eerie yellowing photograph." David Bowie "Fans of Will Oldham and Bill Callahan will find much to admire" The Guardian "a thing of gentle charm & unmistakable cosmic American beauty. It is, for those of us who delight in the likes of Iron & Wine, our first contact with a new & wonderful songwriter" Independent "nine folk-soul nuggets... these are powerful songs" Uncut TICKETS http://www.chapelarts.org/events/?regevent_action=register&event_id=109&name_of_event=Hiss+Golden+Messenger+&William_Tyler WEBSITE http://www.chapelarts.org/

event.name: Ezio
event.tags: Ezio
event.short_description: Italian-born Ezio and Mark 'Booga' Fowell, hailing from Cambridge, have developed their own sensitive style, a mixture of rock and folk full of gorgeous acoustic melodies and intelligent lyrics.
event.long_description: Since the early 90s Ezio have gigged, made albums, been signed numerous times, been dropped nearly as many, travelled all over the world, more gigs, fired managers, been rich, been broke, been chubby, and thinner, then chubbier, had rave reviews, been blessed with faint criticism. They have built up large and loyal followings at home and abroad, frequently described as “easily one of Britain’s best live bands”, with their last album, "10,000 Bars" getting 4/5 reviews in such disparate publications as "The Sun" & "Maverick Magazine". So how do you survive so long in such a cut throat, fickle, fashion driven business? See an Ezio show, visit the website & check out their new album (Title T.B.C) & the answer might be there. See more info at www.ezio.co.uk

event.name: Sound Park Austria - Electropop: Milan
event.tags: Jazz, Electropop, Austria, Camden venue, The Forge, Austrian Cultural Forum London
event.short_description: Innovative and creative Austrian and UK artists featuring electronic/pop/rock artist Milán
event.long_description: The Austrian Cultural Forum London (ACF) promotes cultural contacts between the UK and Austria by organising events and supporting artists and projects in the fields of music, performing arts, film, visual arts, literature, and science. The ACF sponsored project Sound Park Austria introduces innovative and creative projects by Austrian artists to the UK music scene. Milán is the electronic/rock/pop voice of singer-composer Maria Neckam, who initially made a name for herself in New York's modern jazz scene. Her debut single, 'You,' reflects her love for haunting melodies, modern yet accessible harmony, and hefty beats. She is currently working on her debut album with producers Jim Orso / GunsKillMusic and Sam Steele, and performs regularly in New York City. event.name: Anna Coogan
event.tags: anna coogan, live music in surrey, live music in london, live music in woking, live music in godalming, folk music in surrey, folk music london
event.short_description: A former opera singer and fisheries biologist, Anna Coogan has been charming audiences across the world in four languages (English,German, French, and (some) Italian) with her dark indie-folk.
event.long_description: A former opera singer and fisheries biologist, Anna Coogan has been charming audiences across the world in four languages (English,German, French, and (some) Italian) with her dark indie-folk. Maverick magazine described her sound as “Fantastic new music…Americana at its best”, and Blurt Magazine staunchly declared her “one of the best of her breed.” In 2009, only a year into her solo career, Anna Coogan debuted in Europe at the Blue Balls Festival in Luzern, Switzerland, opening for German legends Reamonn. Shortly thereafter she released The Nocturnal Among Us, produced by JD Foster (Patty Griffin, Calexico), which debuted at #1 on the Euro-Americana charts and #26 the Freeform Americana Charts in the US. Two US and three European tours quickly followed, including spots on the BBC, The Belladrum Festival (Scotland), Celtic Connections Festival (Scotland), Club Passim (Boston), The Triple Door (Seattle), The Aladdin Theater (Portland), The Jumpin’ Hot Club (Newcastle, UK), In The Woods (NL) and packed houses across the UK, Netherlands and Northern Germany. She has shared the stage with artists as diverse as Eddie Spaghetti, Reamonn, Alison Brown, Joy Kills Sorrow, Lambchop, Fred Eaglesmith, and many others. Anna has also played live on trendsetter Seattle station KEXP and spent 13 weeks at the top of their charts. Anna is currently set to release her fourth full-length record, The Wasted Ocean, on Sept 18, 2011 in Europe and in January 2012 in the US. Beautifully crafted and oddly unsettling, The Wasted Ocean places Anna’s incomparable voice front and center. Driving banjos, soaring guitars, and swelling strings fuse Coogan’s indie-pop sensibilities with her Americana roots. Coogan’s most complex and engaging work to date, The Wasted Ocean is produced by Evan Brubaker and features Eyvind Kang (Bill Frisell, Laura Viers), Edie Carey, (Shawn Mullins) Darrin Watkins (Vicki Martinez), and Colby Sander (Rachel Harrington), as well as long time collaborators Eric Hastings, Brooks Miner, and Daniele Fiaschi.

event.name: The Orain Series Feat. Heidi Talbot
event.tags: The Orain Series, The Gallery Cafe, Bethnal Gren, Folk, Heidi Talbot
event.short_description: Autumn 2011 marks the debut of The Orain Series - a new non-profit project of registered charity St. Margaret's House showcasing three of the most widely acclaimed folk artists in the UK - Dougie MacLean, Heidi Talbot and James Yorkston.
event.long_description: Staged in the stunning and intimate venue of St Matthew's Church the evening promises a captivating live music experience. Doors open at 6pm, show starts at 7 pm. On Heidi Talbot: Ireland has long been a fount of great female singers, but Heidi Talbot's breakthrough solo release, 2008's In Love + Light, swiftly assured her promotion to the premier league. Its artfully chosen mix of traditional and contemporary material, reinvented classics and little-known gems, and above all Heidi's's achingly bittersweet, spun-gold voice, won glowing reviews across three continents, a US Indie Acoustic Award and a Best Female Vocalist nomination in the Irish Music Awards. With critics mooting comparisons as diverse as Björk, Enya, Linda Ronstadt, Norah Jones and Kirsty MacColl, the album received widespread radio airplay and has been followed by two years' solid gigging, both as headline act and sought-after special guest. Heidi’s hotly anticipated follow-up album The Last Star released in 2010 has marked the artist’s debut foray into songwriting. It also sees her engaging afresh with her traditional roots, while seeking out rarely- or never-recorded contemporary material. "Talbot is primed and ready for crossover success." (Colin Irwin, Daily Telegraph) "An engaging and impressive record." (Robin Denselow, The Guardian) Purchase tickets online at www.seetickets.com.

event.name: DHP Concerts Presents: MARTHA TILSTON
event.tags: Martha Tiltson, live music, cargo
event.short_description: Martha Tilston is a captivating performer, an enchanting singer-songwriter blessed with a gloriously clear and seductively beautiful voice; weaving her magic spell over listeners wherever she plays.
event.long_description: DHP Concerts Presents: MARTHA TILSTON Martha Tilston is a captivating performer, an enchanting singer-songwriter blessed with a gloriously clear and seductively beautiful voice. Weaving her magic spell over listeners wherever she plays - from the concert hall to the campfire, from folk clubs to main festival stages - she is a rare gem who has the power to draw an audience into her world and create an intimate space where her words and music dance and delight, leaving all those present with a smile, a warm feeling inside, and a few issues to ponder, too.

event.name: Anekdoten @ The Underworld Camden
event.tags: Rock, Music, Live, Show, Underworld, Camden
event.short_description: Anekdoten is a Swedish progressive rock band, made up of guitarist/vocalist Nicklas Barker, cellist Anna Sofi Dahlberg, bassist/vocalist Jan Erik Liljeström and drummer Peter Nordins.
event.long_description: Anekdoten is a Swedish progressive rock band, made up of guitarist/vocalist Nicklas Barker, cellist Anna Sofi Dahlberg, bassist/vocalist Jan Erik Liljeström and drummer Peter Nordins. They are notable for the use of the mellotron and the heavy, trippy sound, dominated by a bass guitar. Their music is associated with the tradition of 1970s progressive rock music, especially King Crimson, but they have also covered songs by Van Der Graaf Generator and Magma in their live performances.

event.name: L.A. Guns + Special Guest @ Bogiez, Cardiff
event.tags: L.A. Guns, LA Guns, Cock Rock, Sleazy Rock, Glam Rock, Heavy Metal, Bogiez, Cardiff, South Wales, Bogies, Rock Bar
event.short_description: Sleazy rock legends L.A. Guns performing live at Bogiez this October 7th. Featuring original members Phil Lewis & Steve Riley.
event.long_description: Sleazy rock legends L.A. Guns performing live at Bogiez this October 7th. Featuring original members Phil Lewis & Steve Riley. L.A. Guns got their start on Los Angeles’ Sunset Strip. The band was formed in 1986 and signed with Polygram Records in 1987, recording their first album that summer. This first album, titled “L.A. Guns”, went on to sell 750,000 copies and earned the band its first gold album award. Tours with AC/DC, Iron Maiden and Def Leppard followed. A compilation of the videos made from this first album also earned the band a gold video award. L.A. Guns went into the studio to record their second album, “Cocked and Loaded”, in the spring of 1989. It was a hit right away with the release of “Rip and Tear” as the first single and video. “Never Enough” and “The Ballad of Jayne” followed, pushing album sales over 1,000,000 and earning the band its first platinum record award. The video compilation from this album earned the band its second gold video award. A successful world tour followed. The band’s third album, “Hollywood Vampires”, was recorded in the fall of 1990. With the release of “Kiss My Love Goodbye” as the first single and video, and another successful world tour, the album went on to sell 700,000 copies and earned the band its third gold album award.

event.name: Fini Bearman
event.tags: Singer and composer Fini Bearman, debut album 'Step Up'
event.short_description: Fini Bearman is already being cited as one of the UK's leading contemporary jazz vocalists. Nominated for Jazz Vocalist 2010 by The Global Music Foundation, Fini's heartfelt delivery and choice of song makes her an exciting & unique performer
event.long_description: Singer and composer Fini Bearman is already being cited as one of the UK's leading contemporary jazz vocalists. Recently nominated for Jazz Vocalist 2010 alongside Norma Winstone and Ian Shaw by The Global Music Foundation, Fini's heartfelt delivery and choice of song makes her an exciting, unique performer, and definitely a musician to watch. The new album, 'Step Up', is being released in September, and is a collection of original songs by Fini, influenced by Wayne Shorter, Kurt Rosenwinkel and Gretchen Parlato, and features Rick Simpson on piano, Tom Farmer on bass and Josh Morrison on drums. Largely inspired by Martin Read (composer and head of Music at Alton College) Fini discovered the world of Jazz. She went on to complete a BMus in Music at the Guildhall School of Music and Drama, London, and graduated in July 2007. Whilst there, Fini studied with some of the country’s top musicians, including Martin Hathaway, Pete Churchill, Anita Wardell, and Martin Speake. In the winter of 2008, deciding to further her studies, focusing on composition, Fini applied to study at the Jazz Institute Berlin, where she went on to spend 18 months under the tuition of renowned US vocalist Judy Niemack and US guitarist and composer Kurt Rosenwinkel. Fini graduated with a Masters in Music (voice and composition) in November 2009. Whilst in Berlin, Fini met and played with some inspiring young musicians, and went on to form a band with some of them; Manuel Schmiedel on piano, Andreas Lang on bass and Moritz Baumgaertner on drums. They played at various venues across Berlin and have recently played a couple of special dates in London in June 2010. Now back in the UK, Fini is working once more with her London based Quartet and recently recorded her debut album 'Step Up', due out late Spring 2011. The Quartet Featuring some of London's finest young musicians, the band includes Rick Simpson on piano (Martin Speake), Tom Farmer on bass (Empirical), and Josh Morrison on drums (Round Trip). They formed in late 2007 to play predominantly the compositions of Fini, alongside arrangements of standards and contemporary songs. With a dizzying range of influences from Wayne Shorter to Gretchen Parlato and John Taylor, Fini strives to write songs that reflect her own experiences, both tongue in cheek and with frank honesty. With and without text, poetry settings and original words, this music explores various corners of contemporary music, citing Brazilian and South American influences alongside Western Classical traditions, modern jazz and popular music. Other influences Kurt Elling, Joao Gilberto, Elmo Hope, Q-Tip, Raphael Saadiq, Maria Schneider, Guillermo Klein, Eska Mtungwazi, James Taylor, Milton Nascimento, John Taylor, Donny Hathaway, Fly, The Invisible and Brad Mehldau..... Chagall, Emil Nolde, Monet, John Betjeman, Pablo Neruda, Rumi, Sappho, Dylan Thomas, Salman Rushdie, Fernando Pessoa... Giorgio Locatelli, Smitten Kitchen, and The Hummingbird Bakery. Credits and Quotes 'Fini Bearman's talent and creativity are evident from the moment she begins to sing. With her beautiful voice, contemporary style, and cutting-edge compositions, she raises the bar of excellence for young jazz singers.' - Judy Niemack, Jazz Singer 'A word of praise here for singer Bearman who adds both gravitas and emotion to the piece whilst dealing with what must be some pretty difficult stuff technically'-Ian Mann, www.thejazzmann.com (Review from Carlos Lopez Reals recent album release Mandorla)'An arresting voice'- www.jazzcds.co.uk 'An emergent young vocalist' - Chris May, www.allaboutjazz.com '...Sung with elegant assurance' - Chris Parker, The Vortex Jazz Club http://www.myspace.com/finibearman http://www.finibearman.co.uk TICKETS http://www.chapelarts.org/events/?regevent_action=register&event_id=97&name_of_event=Fini+Bearman WEBSITE http://www.chapelarts.org

The new material for the trio is focused on condensing the joy and optimism and range of emotions found in big filmscore . "The new line-up of Yuri Goloubev (bass) and Asaf Sirkis (drums) enables me to compose and explore enchanting thru- composed material with delicacy but with the power and textures of a larger band." ‘’Melodically its roots are in northern Europe, but on an undercurrent of hypnotic dance like grooves..’’ Special guest vocalist Heidi Vogel will join the trio for part of the programme.

Oozing charisma, panache and swagger on and off stage, in performance no-one could touch them. Now the UK's original and best Rat Pack concert show returns with three dead ringers for Frank, Dean and Sammy.

event.name: Soweto Gospel Choir
event.tags: The Alban Arena, Live Music, St Albans, Hertfordshire, Soweto Gospel Choir
event.short_description:
Soweto Gospel Choir - African Grace
Be uplifted by this joyful spectacular of song and dance.
event.long_description: Friday 7 October - 7.30pm Heralded as the most exciting group to emerge in World Music in recent years, two-time Grammy Award-winning Soweto Gospel Choir returns with a brand new show African Grace. Through vibrant rhythm, movement and its renowned vocal harmonies, Soweto Gospel Choir’s inimitable performance style has become a worldwide phenomenon. Since its foundation in 2002, the Choir has performed to sell-out crowds at the greatest concert halls across the globe and alongside superstars including Bono, Queen, Celine Dion, John Legend, Peter Gabriel, Josh Groban, Aretha Franklin and Stevie Wonder. The Choir’s 24 singers, dancers and musicians deliver a flawless performance of traditional and contemporary songs infused with irrepressible spirit. ‘Meticulous and unstoppable…spirited and spectacular’ … The New York Times ‘These absolutely thrilling singers need nothing but their voices to make dazzling music’ … Billboard

event.name: Feedme Music presents Future Rock
event.tags: rock, live music, 100 Club
event.short_description: Join us at London's legendary live music venue, 100 Club and see The Crave with support including Skinny Machines, two of the most exciting emerging bands around.
event.long_description: Headliner The Crave have been on the road non stop for the last three years touring Europe and America with some of the worlds biggest bands such as Shinedown, 3 Doors Down, Theory Of A Deadman, Buckcherry, Daughtry, Lifehouse, and Flyleaf to name just a few, add to this two UK headline tours and festival slots at Download, Sonisphere and Rock Am Ring the guys have earned their place as one of the most exciting and hardest working bands around. Support from the fantastic Skinny Machines who are reminiscent of The Cure, if they had been crossbred with Biffy Clyro’s dirty guitars, ‘Skinny Machines' echo the night life of South London, producing a shimmering blend of poignant lyrics, heavy riffs and catchy melodies. Having supported the likes of The Kooks, The Zutons and The Maccabees, the trajectory of this band seems like a foregone conclusion. 100% musical satisfaction guaranteed....

event.name: Kiki Dee and Carmelo Luggeri
event.tags: Kiki Dee, pop icon kiki dee, Kiki Dee 'Don't Go Breaking My Heart'
event.short_description: The duo met in the mid 90's and worked together on a Greatest Hits compilation which led to them hooking up and writing music together and they are still working away on what they call 'our ongoing musical experiment.'
event.long_description: 2008 brought a new chapter in the musical relationship between Kiki and Carmelo. They have signed a deal with EMI and for the first time Kiki's albums recorded in the 70's on Elton John's Rocket Records have been re-mastered and released on CD. The 3 albums that Kiki and Carmelo have recorded together which highlight their special collaboration and adventurous musical direction are also in the shops on EMI records....‘its great to walk into a record shop or go on line and see all our music made available’.... says Kiki......and with the help of EMI they are raising their profile with more regular TV and radio appearances. The duo met in the mid 90's and worked together on a Greatest Hits compilation which led to them hooking up and writing music together and they are still working away on what they call 'our ongoing musical experiment.' Live concerts are very important to them and in their unique acoustic guitar based show they bring together their original music with some of Kiki's known songs such as 'Don't Go Breaking My Heart' and 'I've Got The Music In Me' as well as covers of songs by people like Kate Bush and Peter Gabriel to name but a few.....this mix brings the audience to a very intimate and spontaneous evening..... TICKETS http://www.chapelarts.org/events/?regevent_action=register&event_id=22&name_of_event=Kiki+Dee+and+Carmelo+Luggeri WEBSITE http://www.chapelarts.org

event.name: Midway Still
event.tags: BBC 6 Music, Loud + Quiet, NME, The Stool Pigeon, XFM, Artrocker, Mojo, The Quietus, Clash Magazine, Mojo, Drowned In Sound, Underbelly, Radio 1, Shoreditch, Steve Lamacq, Nirvana, Sons And Daughters
event.short_description: 90's Brit Grunge cult band Midway Still return for a headline show at the Underbelly, Hoxton Square. Support comes from Aussie band Bonfire Nights who warm up for their tour with Sons & Daughters with this London show.
event.long_description: Midway Still released their debut single way back in 1991. Now they are back! Occasional gigs over the past few years, including a tour of Japan, have only increased interest in this lost cult band of a mini-generation of classic Brit Grunge/Noise Pop bands that include The Becketts and The Family Cat. Championed by Steve Lamacq at the time and signed to Fire Records amongst others, 2011 could be a perfect time, twenty years on, to check out this bands quality mix of Husker Du meets Beatles guitar pop. If you like Yuck, surely you’ll love Midway Still.

event.name: Earwicker Presents... The Penguin Party
event.tags: kings head, Earwicker, The Penguin Party, Bordeauxxx, aftershow party
event.short_description:
The Penguin Party, crafty powerpop and alternative rock song-stories for grown-ups with support from Bordeauxxx.
Exclusive Earwicker after party downstairs at The Kings Head until 2am! featuring Live DJ and drinks promotions. Bring your badges!
event.long_description: Earwicker are proud to present - The Penguin Party! Crafty powerpop and alternative rock song-stories for grown-ups. No songs about dancing, drugs or teenage angst here... You'll probably recognize people you know in the lyrics. Reassuringly accessible but with an edge like bitter chocolate. Like Ian Dury fronting the Byrds. Like XTC covering Chas'n'Dave. Like Martin Newell joining Madness. Like skimming across a pond on a sunny day in an old fashioned rowing boat, dangling your fingers in the water and unexpectedly having one of them bitten off by something just below the surface. "There may be a better way to start the show than with the storming Essex 4-piece The Penguin Party, but if there is I certainly can't think of it" - Tom Robinson, BBC 6 Music (Jun 2011) Check them out at: http://www.thepenguinparty​.co.uk/ www.myspace.com/penguinpar​tyband www.facebook.com/#!/group.​php?gid=248205235324 Plus support from - Bordeauxxx Beautiful Indie pop from not too far away. Check them out at: http://www.bordeauxxx.band​camp.com/ http://www.twitter.com/bor​deauxxx Live music from 9pm. FREE ENTRY! Exclusive Earwicker after party downstairs at The Kings Head until 2am! featuring Live DJ and drinks promotions. Bring your badges!

event.name: HIGHER ON MAIDEN
event.tags: Iron Maiden, Cardiff, Tombstone, Bogiez, Rock Bar, High on Maiden
event.short_description: HIGHER ON MAIDEN The Original & Finest Iron Maiden Tribute
event.long_description: Friday 7th October @ Bogiez Followed by Cardiff's 100% classic rock and old school heavy metal club night TOMBSTONE. Tickets £7.00 (inc free entry to Tombstone clubnight afterparty) £4.00 for entry to clubnight after band.

event.name: Mentallica, Metal Music on the Wirral
event.tags: Metallica Tribute in Merseyside, Live Rock and metal music on the Wirral, Drink Offers, Beer Garden
event.short_description: Europes Number One Tribute to Metallica
event.long_description: Heated Outdoor Pavillion DJs Shot Girl Drink Offers Jagerbomb £2.05 Fisk Shot £1 Mentallica have matured over the last 10 years and have dedicated themselves to reproducing the sound of Metallica which has lead to the band receiving glowing endorsements from Big Mick Hughes, Metallicas front of house sound engineer. On one memorable night in Dudley, Mentallica had the honour of playing Am I Evil? whilst Brian Tatler, guitarist from Diamond Head, cheered his approval. Mentallica reproduce the tracks as Metallica have recorded them. Playing hits from all nine albums, from Kill ‘Em All to Death Magnetic, Mentallica are, and will remain, four true Metallica fans who play the music because they love it, and feel honored and privileged to be able to call themselves a tribute to their heroes. Revolver is situated near the heart of Birkenhead on The Wirral. This grand building has enough space for 3 stages and 5 music zones; including a smoking area consisting of a large heated outdoor pavillion. It also has Accomodation and free parking available. Revolver is the Premier live music venue on The Wirral. It prides itself on providing high quality tribute acts of all varieties; including rock, metal, punk, indie, soul and even disco; and also on showcasing original and local talent. Although Revolver has always given opportunities to local bands, they have recently teamed up with 7Waves Radio station and also the Vendetta Records Label, and host a monthly event dedicated to the showcasing and promotion of original talent. Revolver also prides itself on the quality and variety of drinks available; from a wide choice of international beers, both bottled and on draught, to a selection of bourbons and rums. And if youre not fussy about your tipple there are always drink offers available! Whether you are looking to dance, chill, rock out or just listen to some great live music, you'll find yourself at home here.

event.name: Lahannya @ The Underworld Camden
event.tags: Rock, Metal, Music, Gothic, Industrial, Live, Gig, Camden, Worlds End
event.short_description:
Lahannya
Stunning industrial rock with a gothic twist from Anglo-German quartet LAHANNYA. For Fans of Lacuna Coil, Marilyn Manson and The Birthday Massacre.
event.long_description: Stunning industrial rock with a gothic twist from Anglo-German quartet LAHANNYA. For Fans of Lacuna Coil, Marilyn Manson and The Birthday Massacre. Frontwoman and gothic icon Lahannya became first known as a solo artist with the release of her debut EP “Drowning”, drawing comparisons to the likes of Throwing Muses and Cocteau Twins. She soon became a sought-after guest vocalist, appearing on releases by Soman, Combichrist, Greenhaus and more recently ASP to name but a few.

event.name: The Hollies
event.tags: The Hollies, live music, st albans, the alban arena, hertfordshire
event.short_description: Iconic Band, The Hollies, will be bringing their talents to the Alban Arena - a very special event not to be missed.
event.long_description: With more hits than The Beatles, The Hollies helped shape the world of Pop and Rock as we know it today. No support is needed as they perform their classics ‘The Air That I Breathe’, ‘Bus Stop’, ‘Carrie Anne’, He Ain’t Heavy, He’s My Brother’ and much more.

event.name: The Real Thing
event.tags: The Real Thing, Soul
event.short_description: With their own five piece band the three original vocalists Chris Amoo, Eddie Amoo and Dave Smith return with all their top ten hits, plus a medley of classics from the 70s.
event.long_description: Britain's number one soul band now celebrate 36 years together. With the huge multi-million selling hits, 'You To Me Are Everything', 'Can't Get By Without You' and Feel The Force', the trio enjoyed other top ten successes, including 'You'll Never Know What You're Missing' and 'Whenever You Want My Love'. More recently their earlier hits were remixed resulting in a huge club following.

event.name: Groove Oven presents Outhouse Ruhabi
event.artists: Robin Fincker & Tom Challenger (tenor sax), Johnny Brierley (bass), Dave Smith (drums) plus Baboucar Camara, Kaw Secka, Alieu Saine & Pap Cham (sabar)
event.tags: Live Jazz, Contemporary Jazz, West African rhythms, World Music, North London, Camden live venue, Forge venue
event.short_description: Amazing collaboration between Loop Collective’s Outhouse and West Africa’s percussion-based Ruhabi
event.long_description: Doors open at 7pm for diners, music starts at 8pm Loyalty Card Holdlers - this concert applies to our loyalty card scheme Groove Oven celebrates the rich diversity of London's music scene by exploring musical styles from all over the world. Tonight Groove Oven presents Outhouse Ruhabi an amazing collaboration between Loop Collective's Outhouse and West Africa's percussion based Ruhabi. The brainchild of drummer Dave Smith, Outhouse Ruhabi is the culmination of years spent studying West African rhythms whilst being rooted in the heart of today’s London contemporary Jazz scene. This unique project has received the support from BBC Performing Arts Fund, Arts Council England, PRS-Foundation and the Jerwood Foundation. It is possible to dine during this performance. Purchasing a ticket for the music does not automatically reserve a table in the restaurant. To book a table to dine, please ring Caponata Restaurant on 020 7387 5959. Diners and non-diners welcome.

event.name: Joe Brown
event.tags: Rock and Roll, Guitar, Rockabilly, Gospel, Country, Folk
event.short_description: Back by popular demand, this country's premier rock and roll legend returns for an intimate performance with his five piece band incorporating his son and record producer Pete Brown.
event.long_description: Joe will be on stage all evening playing the musical styles that are as unique as the man himself. Oozing talent and wisdom, experience and class, expect timeless classics, rockabilly, gospel, country, folk, electric rock & roll interwoven with Joe's effervescent delivery and humorous reminiscences.

event.name: L.A Guns @ The Underworld Camden
event.artists: L.A. Guns, Phil Lewis, Steve Riley, Prophets Of Addiction
event.tags: Metal, Rock, Live, Gig, Camden, Worlds End
event.short_description:
L.A. Guns featuring Phil Lewis and Steve Riley
Plus: Prophets Of Addiction
The band was formed in 1986 and signed with Polygram Records in 1987.
event.long_description: L.A. Guns got their start on Los Angeles’ Sunset Strip. The band was formed in 1986 and signed with Polygram Records in 1987, recording their first album that summer. This first album, titled "L.A. Guns", went on to sell 750,000 copies and earned the band its first gold album award. Tours with AC/DC, Iron Maiden and Def Leppard followed. A compilation of the videos made from this first album also earned the band a gold video award. L.A. Guns went into the studio to record their second album, "Cocked and Loaded", in the spring of 1989. It was a hit right away with the release of "Rip and Tear" as the first single and video. "Never Enough" and "The Ballad of Jayne" followed, pushing album sales over 1,000,000 and earning the band its first platinum record award. The video compilation from this album earned the band its second gold video award. A successful world tour followed. The band’s third album, "Hollywood Vampires", was recorded in the fall of 1990. With the release of "Kiss My Love Goodbye" as the first single and video, and another successful world tour, the album went on to sell 700,000 copies and earned the band its third gold album award. 2011 sparked the triumphit return of Scotty Griffin on Bass. The "Bookends" (Stacey and Scotty) and the boys are geared to tear it up across the world giving audiences the high octane Rock-n-Roll that is L.A. Guns.

event.name: Ashley Fayth
event.tags: folk , Bath, Live music
event.short_description:
Fresh on the UK folk scene, this 24 year-old Newfoundlander is bringing something very different to the stage – and people are stopping to listen.
The Canadian songstress’s new album Wonder Wonder, to be released on September 27th
event.long_description: Fresh on the UK folk scene, this 24 year-old Newfoundlander is bringing something very different to the stage – and people are stopping to listen. The Canadian songstress’s new album Wonder Wonder, to be released on September 27th, is a colourful collection of stories about people, seasons, mad scientists, books, heartbreak, and home – with a jar of bluebells and a healthy slathering of peanut butter thrown in for good measure. As the winner of the 2011 Universal Music Camp Songwriters competition, the 2011 Canadian Songwriters’ Association AGM competition, and a finalist for this year’s Listening Room International and Copenhagen Songwriters Festival competitions, her music has received critical acclaim and international radio airplay. Ashley’s songs are vibrant yet warm; honest, intimate, and influenced by both contemporary alternative sounds and the traditional music of the fishing outports where she grew up. Her emotive vocals showcase newly refined pop-folk sensibilities and a poetic yet quirky lyrical style often compared to Laura Marling, Regina Spektor, and Joni Mitchell. “Pure, simple, clean, well-written, melodic, reaffirming and personable, if not always intimate. Her songs come naturally, like a clear river over rounded stones.” Robert Singerman, former agent of R.E.M. & James Brown TICKETS http://www.chapelarts.org/events/?regevent_action=register&event_id=114&name_of_event=Ashley+Fayth WEBSITE http://www.chapelarts.org/

event.name: Yob + guests
event.artists: Yob, Dark Castle, Kongh, Dead Existence
event.tags: yob, dark castle, kongh, dead existence, underground alliance, mathew hopkins witchfinder, 10th october, purple turtle, camden, sludge, mornington cresent, doom, psych, metal, crust, heavy
event.short_description:
Underground alliance & Mathew Hopkins witchfinder present:
Yob Dark Castle Kongh Dead Existence
event.long_description: Yob Is a psych/doom metal band from Eugene, Oregon composed of Aaron Reiseberg, Travis Foster, and Mike Scheidt. A skull crushing almost spiritual live experience, that has to be seen/heard to be believed. YOB were THE highlight of the 2010 Roadburn Festival, both times! A rare appearance on these shores, don't miss the opportunity to see these guys at the Purple Turtle with such a stella lineup! Dark castle is an American doom metal band formed by guitarist–vocalist Stevie Floyd and drummer–vocalist Rob Shaffer in 2005. They released their first full-length album, Spirited Migration, in 2009. New album Surrender To All Life has pushed the band further into sonic excess and will surely be up there with the best albums of the year. dark castle summon the power to open minds and move mountains using only a guitar, a drum kit, two voices, two minds and a bottomless well of earth-shaking riffs. Kongh Kongh are a sludge/doom metal threepiece from Sweden. While many bands do heavy well, Kongh pull it off better than most. Incorporating styles that include everything from Neurosis' "Souls at Zero" to Opeth's "Deliverance". Also not a million miles from headliners Yob, Kongh offers listeners an opportunity to experience the best elements of doom, sludge, progressive, and atmospheric metal. The band is currently working on new material, preparing to record a third album later in 2011. Dead existence Play a blend of sludge, doom, hardcore and stoner rock but pull influences from every corner of extreme music. "They may have an occasional stoner bent, but Dead Existence's sludge-laden trawl carries a gut-punching heft, the riffs a show of ill-destined perseverance while the vocalists bereft, defiant barks start to take on emotional, cathartic hue, dragging us down to whatever purgatory spawned them"

event.name: 1349 @ The Underworld Camden
event.tags: Rock, Music, Club, Show, Performance, Underworld, Camden, Worlds End
event.long_description: 1349 rose from the ashes of Alvheim in 1997, counting Ravn (vocals & drums), Tjalve (guitars), Seidemann (bass) and Balfori (guitars). Balfori quit shortly after due to musical divergence. In early ’99 the band found Archaon whose speed and technique took their music to a new level of intensity and brutality. Come spring 2000, 1349 decided to record a new promo showcasing the new material, and Frost of Satyricon was asked to lay down the drum tracks to get the speed required. Holycaust Records offered them a deal and released the new promo as an eponymous MCD. By early 2001, the band felt they had enough killer songs for a full-length album – “Liberation”. Hearing this material, Frost was so impressed that he asked to join and became a permanent member of the band. Recorded and mixed at Gordon Studios, Liberation blended old school soundscapes with warp-speed hysteria. 1349 signed with Candlelight Records in 2003 and released their debut full-length album in April 2003, then marched unstoppably forwards with the following releases “Beyond the Apocalypse” in 2004 and “Hellfire” in 2005. Guitarist and founding member Tjalve left in 2006 to focus his musical efforts on his band Pantheon I. Four years after the release of “Hellfire”, 1349 decided to unleash a quite different monster upon the unsuspecting masses and “Revelations of the Black Flame” saw 1349 return to Studio Studio Nyhagen with Tom G. Warrior co-mixing the album along with Ravn. Released May 25th 2009 on Candlelight Records, Revelations… saw 1349 explore the slower, darker and more ambient side of black metal, while still retaining the spirit of aural hellfire. An even deeper darkness was added to the sphere of 1349…it became evident that from here, it was gonna get scary. 2010 was a year when 1349 really started to flex muscles. With new cooperation partner Indie Recordings as the chosen label, 1349 unleashed their latest aural assault DEMONOIR, filled to the brim with abyssic darkness and hellish energy. This release – by far their most brutal to this date – showed that the band had gotten capable at blending a deeper and more sinister darkness with extreme intensity and venomous aggression, another proof of the band’s innovative take on Black Metal. 2011 brings 1349 to places dark and strange; be warned, and be ready…

event.name: Gary Crosby and Tomorrow's Warriors Jazz Orchestra
event.artists: Gary Crosby + Tomorrow's Warriors Jazz Orchestra
event.tags: jazz, black british jazz, open university, tomorrow's warriors, nu civilisation orchestra
event.short_description: Gary Crosby and the Tomorrow's Warriors Jazz Orchestra (now renamed the Nu Civilisation Orchestra) present Firebird - a new programme at the crossroads of jazz and classical music where Charlie Parker meets Igor Stravinsky
event.long_description: 18:45 Pre-Concert Talk: Black British Jazz and the Meaning of Music in the UK, where Dr. Jason Toynbee of the Open University discusses themes and issues from the research project, What Is Black British Jazz? If black musicians have always been a minority in the British jazz scene they have nevertheless contributed in important ways to the emergence of jazz in the UK. The talk illustrates why this contribution has been so extraordinary, and also what it means in a Britain where racism and multiculturalism still co-exist in an uneasy relationship.

event.name: Ghost Brigade @ The Underworld Camden
event.artists: Ghost Brigade, A Storm of Light, Intronaut
event.tags: Music, Rock, Metal, Hardcore, Live, Gig, Camden, Worlds End
event.short_description:
Ghost Brigade
Plus: A Storm Of Light Intonaut
Ghost Brigade is a five-piece metal band from Jyväskylä
event.long_description: Ghost Brigade is a five-piece metal band from Jyväskylä, Finland, formed in 2005. They have taken elements from melodic death metal, doom metal and progressive metal into their music. Wille Naukkarinen (guitars): “In Ghost Brigade, selling albums is not what it’s about. It’s about the feeling I get when I write a new song, which I only get when I know the song is good enough. The metaphor for that is “the fire”. That explains the title of the album. We are guided by fire.” A quote on their website states (by date of the debut release) “there’s nothing above or below us, no written word wise enough, just notes that carry the silent fire.”

event.name: I Am A Camera
event.artists: I Am A Camera, The I.D
event.tags: Loud + Quiet, NME, The Stool Pigeon, XFM, Clash Magazine, Mix Mag, Cargo, Electro Pop, Radio 1
event.short_description: London based electro band of the moment I Am A Camera headline Hoxton Underbelly.
event.long_description: It was a chance meeting while escaping from the burning wreckages of their former incarnations – Ian and Francesca collided and sparked an idea for a new band. It grew and grew in more discussions over multiple drinks in Manchester’s dive bars and London’s clubs of disrepute. They were both over everything and wanted something more. Melancholy machines and hard beats. “With I Am A Camera we wanted to create a cold wall of sound as an emotional outlet for our deepest thoughts and musings” explains Francesca. Swapping their pet loves of Bow Wow Wow, Layfayette from True Blood, Astrid Kirchherr, Paisley Park and Arthur C Clarke clicked. ‘We’re the band who fell to Earth’. I Am A Camera was born in October 2010. They aim to sweep you off your feet.London based I AM A Camera

event.name: Jazz @ The Cavern With David Newton
event.tags: jazz in london, jazz in surrey, live music in surrey, live music in woking, live music in guildford, live music in godalming
event.short_description: David Newton has an international reputation as a jazz pianist with a large number of albums to his name. Growing up in Renfrewshire, Scotland, he had a musical upbringing with the piano trio sound of Peterseon.
event.long_description: David Newton has an international reputation as a jazz pianist with a large number of albums to his name. Growing up in Renfrewshire, Scotland, he had a musical upbringing with the piano trio sound of Peterseon, Tatum or Garner played daily in his home. After graduating from Leeds Colege of Music in 1979, David teamed up with saxophonist Alan Barnes, moving to London where he rapidly became a much sought after pianist after playing with guitarist Martin Taylor and saxophonist Don Weller. Having recorded with Buddy de Franco and Martin Taylor, Newton and Barnes worked for 'Concorde Label' agent Barry Hatcher and made several recordings. Later in the 90's David made a reputation for himself as an accompanist for singers Tina May, Claire Martin and Stacey Kent, with whom he spent the next ten years recording and travelling all over the world. The recent CD 'Portrait of a Woman' establishes a new musical freedom for the Trio with David leading as arranger and composer. He was voted the best jazz pianist in the British Jazz Awards for the 8th time in 2008 and was made a Fellow of Leeds College of Music in 2003. "There is always more to Newton's playing than first meets the ear. The surface may be smooth, but there are all kinds of clever, subtle things going on beneath" - Dave Gelly, The Observer. "Fantastic mainstream pianist who plays with wit and grace, as well as swinging like the clappers.." - Time Out. Joining David for this special event at the Cavern will be Marianne Windham (bass) and Ed Williams (drums).

event.name: Mike Tramp and The Rock n Roll Circuz @ The Underworld
event.artists: Mike Tramp, Mike Tramp and The Rock n Roll Circuz, Crimes Of Passion
event.tags: Rock, Music, Metal, Live, Gig, Worlds End, Camden
event.short_description:
Mike Tramp & The Rock N Roll Circuz
Plus: Crimes Of Passion
Mike Tramp (Born Michael Trempenau January 14, 1961) is a Danish singer and songwriter.
event.long_description: Mike Tramp (Born Michael Trempenau January 14, 1961) is a Danish singer and songwriter who is best known for his work with the hard rock bands White Lion and Freak of Nature. He has released 14 albums, including seven solo albums. The style of his music these days is pure rock, reminiscent of Bruce Springsteen and Tom Petty but with a bit of a harder edge to it.

event.name: Ian McFeron
event.tags: Alisa Milner, a Texas-style fiddler, Ian McFeron, album Summer Nights, compared to Bob Dylan
event.short_description: Ian McFeron, whose lyrical prose has been compared to Bob Dylan, Ryan Adams and David Gray, weaves together a variety of roots-Americana styles to create his own unique blend of roots-oriented American music.
event.long_description: Ian McFeron, whose lyrical prose has been compared to Bob Dylan, Ryan Adams and David Gray, weaves together a variety of roots-Americana styles to create his own unique blend of roots-oriented American music. A fully independent artist and self-functioning record label, McFeron has shared the stage with artists such as Patty Griffin, Nanci Griffith, Shawn Mullins, Brandi Carlile, Mike Doughty, Sister Hazel, Amos Lee, Hayes Carll, and Missy Higgins, and is dedicated to building audiences on the road, touring the United States and Europe over 200 dates a year. Currently, McFeron is on tour in support of his newest album “Summer Nights,” recorded in Nashville, TN with a cast of musicians drawn from Ryan Adams’ and Patty Griffin’s touring bands. On the road, McFeron (vocals, guitars, piano) is joined by Alisa Milner, a Texas-style fiddler, cellist and harmony vocalist. http://www.facebook.com/ianmcferon http://www.myspace.com/ianmcferon http://www.ianmcferon.com TICKETS http://www.chapelarts.org/events/?regevent_action=register&event_id=107&name_of_event=Ian+McFeron WEBSITE http://www.chapelarts.org

event.name: Steve Tilston
event.tags: Steve Tilston, The Farncombe Cavern, Live music in surrey, live music in guildford, live music in godalming
event.short_description: Steve Tilston is one of this country’s greatest song-writers with many of his songs considered modern folk-song classics and covered by the likes of Fairport Convention, Dolores Keane, John Wright and others.
event.long_description: The Farncombe Cavern is pleased to welcome back Steve Tilston, who performed here last on the on the 13th June 2010. The writer of the classic songs “The Slip Jigs and Reels”, “The Naked Highwayman”, and “Here’s to Tom Paine” has a new album out on Hubris Records. Entitled Ziggurat, hear Tilston deftly weave his mastery on a dozen new insightful songs of love, loss, war and gold, plus the reworking of a couple of gems from the tradition; with special guest musicians Dave Bowie, Chris Parkinson, Richard Curran, Fin McArdle and Maggie Boyle. Steve Tilston is one of this country’s greatest song-writers with many of his songs considered modern folk-song classics and covered by the likes of Fairport Convention, Dolores Keane, John Wright and others. He’s also renowned for the way he takes a favourite traditional “old chestnut” and makes it his own. His career was marked last year by the release of Reaching Back a 5-CD boxed-set retrospective. Not one to stand still though and with “Madame Muse” on his heels, Steve is “reaching forward” with this new collection. Born in Liverpool and raised in the Midlands, Steve has been quietly ploughing his own artistic furrow, turning out quality albums since the early 70s; again it has born fruit with the masterful new album. In the past he has toured as guitarist with Ballet Rambert, as a member of Ship of Fools, with John Renbourn and more recently with WAZ! He is a celebrated artist both in Britain and abroad, winning accolades in Europe, Australia and the USA, where “Here’s to Tom Paine,” has been chosen as the theme song for the Tom Paine society of America. Steve is one of the most engaging performers on the scene today. “…in better form than I’ve ever heard him.” - Mike Harding, BBC Radio 2 “Gently intoxicating and uplifting stuff” - MoJo Magazine, UK “His music has a flow and poignancy which makes it stand out from the plethora of singer-songwriters on the scene” - Guitar Magazine USA “Steve is of that rare breed of singer, songwriter and guitarist who actually excels in all departments” - Froots Magazine, UK “His songs are at once familiar, yet objects of wonder” - Rhythms, Aus

event.name: While She Sleeps @ The Underworld Camden
event.tags: Rock, Music, Band, Show, Performance, Camden, London, Underworld
event.short_description:
While She Sleeps + Bury Tomorrow
The band has grown together and moulded into a top metal act that have always seemed to steal the show with their crazy live performances. That is hard for anyone to deny.
event.long_description: There is a spark of excitement at a While She Sleeps show. This band certainly gets the crowd on their feet, moving their heads and slamming their body’s into each other while appreciating the heavy Steel City act. They’ve been great support for big time bands such as ‘Enter Shikari’ and ‘Bury Tomorrow’, along with many more. From seeing my first While She Sleeps gig (Abbreviated to being, WSS), I have witnessed a huge difference in how they play, the energy that they show on stage, and their bond as a band. Individually, they work their asses off 100% and now it’s paying off. They are playing shows at many cities in the UK, as well as in Belgium, too! The band has grown together and moulded into a top metal act that have always seemed to steal the show with their crazy live performances. That is hard for anyone to deny. Their numerous own written songs have gone down very well with their drastically growing fan-base, and nothing but praise and admiration goes out to them. With songs like ‘I Am King’ and ‘Gepetto’ along with many more addictive sounds, it pleases and excites me for what is coming next. Catchy metal riffs and heavy fast beats mixed with a great stage performance are sure to be on the agenda. They have recently had a change in vocalist, not through a fall-out, but through having a good enough relationship to decide what is best for the band. A new front-man may be a great move for the Steel City metalers, so they can pursue in making even better songs and giving their fans music that is unique, with ex Revenance vocalist, Lawrence Taylor. The future looks bright for this great bunch of lads, with an EP on the way and a tour in December with Ignominious Incarceration; you should get down to a show and find out for yourself how exciting they are!

event.name: The Long Room Concert with Natalie Clein

event.name: Becky Green
event.tags: Bath, Live music
event.short_description:
Original material from her first album 'All About Everything' & new material from her forthcoming release 'The Searching'.
Fresh-faced from her musical adventure in the US she has been steaming forward with new material and experimental sounds.
event.long_description: Becky Green returns to the Chapel Arts Centre with her extended band to give us an evening of original material from her first album 'All About Everything' as well as debuting new material from her forthcoming release 'The Searching'. Fresh-faced from her musical adventure in the US she has been steaming forward with new material and experimental sounds. Her pure, layered vocals and piano style now intertwine with more expansive moments that the full band provide. Come along for an inspiring musical treat that will leave you with her music whirling round your head for days! TICKETS http://www.chapelarts.org/events/?regevent_action=register&event_id=91&name_of_event=Becky+Green WEBSITE http://www.chapelarts.org/

event.name: Airplay: Subajah Family, The Staves & Riker Maneuver
event.artists: Subajah Family, The Staves, Riker Maneuver
event.tags: adult
event.short_description: A live music club night where you get to hear the hottest unsigned bands and artists around with an open mic at the start of the night!
event.long_description: A live music club night where you get to hear the hottest unsigned bands and artists around with an open mic at the start of the night! The Subajah Family are an urban soul reggae band who have built a mystical, soulful and poetic sound around unique melodies. The Staves are three sisters who blend their distinctive voices into beautiful, spell-binding harmonies, singing their delicately crafted songs with a folk-twist here, a nod to Americana there, and a distinctly British sound. Our headline act, Riker Maneuver are a great four piece with songs ranging from a blast of musical noise to a quiet storm and back again. Live performances are full of energy and comic genius.

event.name: CyberSoniK Festival @ The Underworld Camden
event.artists: V2A, Method Cell, Machine Rox, Kommand, Kontrol, Terrornation, Decayed Reflection, Dreams Divide
event.tags: Electro, Neon, Dance, Rock, Metal, Music, Live, Gig, Camden, Worlds End
event.short_description:
CyberSoniK Festival
Featuring: V2A Method Cell Machine Rox Kommand Kontrol Terrornation Decayed Reflection Dreams Divide
event.long_description: V2A – The “CyberElectro” stars V2A are headlining the festival! Their latest album “Machine Corps” has been praised as one of the best album in the Electro-EBM-Industrial genre. “Machine Corps“ – the third release of the British-German project V2A is the best and even harshest album the band has ever created. With their first two albums “EBM” (Trisol) and “Mechanized Infantry” (Biohazzard) V2A became famous for their distinctive way to mix CyberElectro, EBM and Industrial. “Machine Corps“ goes one step further – it is both more mature and even deeper than its predecessors. Techno-like vocals meet pumping bass lines and atmospheric soundscapes. Masterminds Kevin Steward and Ines Lehmann created a new electronic masterpiece – tracks like “Electro ueber alles” and “Cannibal Clan” will surely become the new Electro-hymns in your local club. www.v2a.co.uk METHOD CELL "Method Cell have certainly made their manifesto known on their debut effort, and may have just come up with the best EBM album of the year so far" (NXLive Magazine). www.methodcell.com

event.name: Johnny Coppin & Mike Silver
event.tags: live music, bath
event.short_description: The two voices are a natural mix, music from the soul, delivered with powerful conviction by a duo in the truest sense of that word. Their live shows encapsulate a blend of skill and powerful emotion.
event.long_description: The two voices are a natural mix, music from the soul, delivered with powerful conviction by a duo in the truest sense of that word. Their live shows encapsulate a blend of skill and powerful emotion. The commitment from both artists to put the songs first, is manifest and their willingness to work for each other on stage is inspirational. You haven't heard a duo until you've heard this one! Johnny and Mike first met Penzance in the early seventies. Since then their paths have seldom crossed but a chance phone call in late 2004 generated the idea of them playing music together. The two voices are a natural mix and the way they share the songs shows this to be a duo in the truest sense. The combination of Johnny's piano and Mike's guitar gets right to the heart of the listener. This is music from the soul, delivered with powerful conviction by a duo in the truest sense of that word. The delight they take in playing the music is plain to see and their live shows encapsulate a blend of skill and powerful emotion. The commitment from both artists to put the songs first, is manifest and their willingness to work for each other on stage is inspirational. Their first duo album released a couple of years ago, Breaking the Silence, Faymus Recordings FRCD 0101, is collection of 15 songs with an unlisted surprise track. With this recording the duo displays their ability to write together, perform cover versions by other writers as well as enhance the arrangements of each other's compositions. It's the real deal, the complete package. Johnny Coppin “One of the finest voices” - Q Magazine. “Johnny Coppin is one of my favourite singers and songwriters and playing music with him is a joy and a pleasure” - Mike Silver. Johnny began in the 1970's as one of the founders of the folk-rock band Decameron. Since the band's break-up in 1976, he has pursued a solo career playing arts centres and festivals in Europe and beyond. Johnny has recorded over a dozen albums and these include, Edge of Day with poet Laurie Lee, an album of Gloucestershire songs and three Christmas CDs, while his 2005 album, The Winding Stair, has been receiving excellent reviews. Mike Silver “Hidden gem. Now the secret is out” – Bob Harris. “I’ve been a big fan of Mike Silver and his songs for years so it’s such an honour and delight to be touring together” - Johnny Coppin Emerging in the 1970's, Mike was one of the first signings to Elton John's Rocket Records. Since moving on from Rocket, he has played festivals, clubs and arts centres all over Europe and released a good number of albums in the process. In July 2003, Mike's song, “Not a Matter of Pride”, from his album Solid Silver was added to the play lists of no less than 36 local radio stations up and down the UK and was given extensive rotation on BBC Radio 2 on Terry Wogan's early morning programme. Johnny Coppin: www.johnnycoppin.co.uk Mike Silver: www.mikesilver.co.uk TICKETS http://www.chapelarts.org/events/?regevent_action=register&event_id=98&name_of_event=Johnny+Coppin+&Mike_Silver WEBSITE http://www.chapelarts.org/

event.tags: Reggae, Aswad, Musical Youth, Leicester, 2Funky
event.short_description: Aswad live in Leicester with support from Musical Youth
event.long_description: Aswad ★► Live In Concert With Full Backing Band Supported By Musical Youth ★►Live With Full Band Further Support By Mega Dub Daddy Fishead Junior Blues Ibi Sound With strong elements of R&B and Soul, reggae stars Aswad formed in the mid-seventies and have since recorded twenty-one albums. With some of their first songs penned about being young and Black in the UK, they were highly relevant to the cultural climate of the time. However, Aswad are best known for hits such as “Don’t Turn Around” and “Shine,” which stormed the charts in the eighties and nineties. Aswad are a stand-out feature of eighties pop culture and a fantastic live band – now part of the decade’s big revival! They will be supported by fellow reggae favourites “Musical Youth.” Early Bird Tickets ◆£15.00 until September 15th ◆Online and in store @ 2funky and Rockaboom Records ◆http://www.2funkytickets.c​o.uk/site/32.asp?mode=main​&catID=670 Standard Tickets ◆£20 ◆Online and in store ◆http://www.2funkytickets.c​o.uk/site/32.asp?mode=main​&catID=670 Details ❚Saturday 15th October ❚8pm-4am ❚18 years + ID may be required ▄▄▄▄▄▄ // Venue // ▄▄▄▄▄▄ ❚The Auditorium ❚Leicester market ❚40 Market Place ❚leicester ❚LE1 5GF ❚www.theauditorium.info

event.name: Paul Curreri
event.tags: American, folk, Hoxton Bar & Kitchen, Mojo, Devon Sproul, American UK.
event.short_description: Paul Curreri is a renowned American singer/songwriter making a rare appearance in the UK.
event.long_description: Paul Curreri is renowned for his inspired songs, bright voice, and talented finger style playing. Described by WTJU’s Aer Stephen as “a ruffled gypsy gutter cowboy, a true life adventurer, a bright new voice”, he has also been compared to Martin Sexton because of his reputation for inspired live performances. Raised in Richmond, Virginia, Paul now makes his home in Charlottesville with songwriter/guitarist Devon Sproule and his sixth album, ‘California’, was released in the UK on Tin Angel Records in 2010. Recorded after Paul recovered from a serious throat injury, this pivotal experience inspired an outpouring of his most meditative and musically diverse material to date, a record that marries the shambling roots rock-edginess of previous album ‘Velvet Rut’ with the finger-picked country blues of earlier efforts like ‘From Long Gones To Hawkesmoth’. It’s a joyous step forward in Curreri’s burgeoning career “5 STARS… With his instinctive, sensual gift for melody, Curreri’s songs are saturated in colour and feeling, the sonic equivalent of William Eggleston’s photography. Superb.” -Mojo
